definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon

sentences.english: And somewhere shining snow polished by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 某处被风抛光的雪闪耀着光芒。

sentences.english: Polish the crosshead pin to mirror surface.
WA 8487 can improve the evening of leathers after being polished with mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 机械抛光时，增加皮身的平整性。

sentences.english: Stainless steel polished tank with filter imbedded in, which is good-looking.
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢抛光箱体，滤器嵌在箱体内，外形美观。

sentences.english: It can be predicted that water-based nano-diamond polishing slurry will gain more attention and applications.
sentences.chinese: 水基纳米金刚石抛光液可能是未来抛光液的发展方向。

sentences.english: It can be predicted that water-based nano-diamond polishing slurry will gain more attention and applications.
sentences.chinese: 水基纳米金刚石抛光液可能是未来抛光液的发展方向。

sentences.english: The factory also has grinding polishing parts of the laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 厂内还设有零部件研磨抛光工艺试验室。

sentences.english: And the metal parts are all highly polished and blued to a deep, rich black color.
sentences.chinese: 而金属零件都是高度抛光和发蓝到深，丰富的黑色。

sentences.english: Meguiar's pure polishes are non-abrasive and totally safe for your car's finish.
sentences.chinese: 美光的纯抛光剂是非研磨性的，而且对漆面绝对安全。

sentences.english: Tin free, polishing antifouling composition with cuprous oxide.
sentences.chinese: 含氧化亚铜的无锡自抛光防污涂料。

sentences.english: Frame of mirror polished solid stainless steel 10mm or 12mm.
sentences.chinese: 抛光的镜框固体不锈钢10mm或12毫米。

sentences.english: The polishing agents have minimal cut and finish without any micro marring or dullness.
sentences.chinese: 抛光剂的最小割和完成翻没有任何微型或沉闷。

sentences.english: Highly polished stainless steel four-way swivel.
After that, use water-mill machine to polish the edges and angles of the slate material.
sentences.chinese: 之后，用水磨机对石板的边角进行抛光。

sentences.english: Cold solidifying surface anti-contamination agent of polished tile was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 本文研制了室温固化的抛光砖表面防污剂。

sentences.english: Machu Picchu was built in the classical Inca style, with polished dry-stone walls.
sentences.chinese: 马丘比丘的建筑具有印加传统风格，抛光干石墙。

definition: the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc
to scrub with an abrasive/to sand/frosted (e.g. glass)
to apply paint, veneer etc/to plaster over/decorative coating/finish/veneer
